author: Kiril Nikolaev
title: U.S. Is the Coronavirus Epicenter Because Donald Trump Took This Massive Gamble
description: President Donald Trump hoped that the virus would go away in April. It appears that he is doing nothing to soften the blow of the pandemic. The post U.S. Is the Coronavirus Epicenter Because Donald Trump Took This Massive Gamble appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• President Donald Trump hoped coronavirus would go away in April.
  • The president is influencing Americans expectations of the number of coronavirus deaths.
  • It would appear that Trump is doing nothing to soften the blow of the pandemic.
